title: DHS says U.S. on "heightened alert" for Russian cyberattack
content:
1. DHS says U.S. on "heightened alert" for Russian cyberattack  CBS News
  2. Homeland Security Warns Russian-Ukraine Crisis Could Lead to Cyberattacks in U.S.  KPIX CBS SF Bay Area
  3. US believes Russia may soon launch cyberattacks against critical American infrastructure: source  Fox Business
  4. U.S. considering controlling exports to Russia if there is an invasion of Ukraine  CBS News
  5. U.S. Considers ‘Potent’ Export Controls Against Russia Amid Ukraine Tensions  The Wall Street Journal
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: DHS、ロシアのサイバー攻撃に対して米国が「厳戒態勢」にあると発表
